data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Camagüey that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Camagüey, Cuba
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Camagüey, Cuba to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Camagüey, Cuba a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Camagüey to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Camagüey
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Camagüey, Camagüey, Cuba.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Camagüey, Cuba know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Camagüey. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Please, teach the 36,500 believers in Camagüey, Cuba how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
